mapper.select: select * from employee e,employee_unit eu,unit u where e.employee_id=eu.employee_id and eu.unit_id=u.unit_id and u.unit_id = #{unitId}
select * from employee e LEFT JOIN employee_role er on e.employee_id = er.employee_id LEFT JOIN role r on r.role_id = er.employee_role_id where r.role_id in (2,3,4)
select u.* from unit u left join employee_unit eu on eu.unit_id = u.unit_id left join employee e on eu.employee_id = e.employee_id where e.employee_id = #{doctorId}

select e.employee_id, e.employee_name, u.unit_id, u.unit_name, r.role_id, r.role_name from employee e left join employee_unit eu on e.employee_id = eu.employee_id left join unit u on eu.unit_id = u.unit_id left join employee_role er on e.employee_id = er.employee_id left join role r on er.role_id = r.role_id
